lore: Imps are noisy, unruly creatures, more dangerous to themselves than to the rest of the world. However, ambitious individuals abandon their villages to seek their fortune outside their lands.\n\nImp Hexers have a natural talent for teaching magic to other creatures. Indeed, they sometimes train Imp children from nearby families, who often end up burning their own cabins when their parents are distracted.
menagerieDialog: Got any more of them feel-goods?
We go visit Torun and spit on altar! Go now!
We go to war... without crab helmets? No, no. Stupid. Very stupid.
(It's wearing a crab on its head while eating a bunch of mushrooms, many of which are sure to be poisonous.)
Step one, take feelgood of choice. Step two, mash in hands. Step three, eat. Step four, enjoy!
name: Imp Hexer
